title: After football World Cup exit and coaching shake-up, Cameroon braces for AFCON challenge
summary: After failing to qualify for the 2026 FIFA World Cup and sacking their coach just weeks before AFCON, Cameroon's national football team is facing an uphill battle ahead of their opening game against Gabon on Wednesday. But newly appointed coach David Pagou says he's up for the challenge. Story by Laurent Berstecher.
